# LURA — llms.txt

> LURA is a Bulgarian wellness brand offering Corti-Glow, a science-backed evening mocktail supplement for stress relief, hormonal balance, and beauty from within.

## About LURA
- Brand: LURA (Лура Лаб ЕООД)
- Website: https://luralab.eu
- Language: Bulgarian (bg)
- Category: Health supplements, wellness, adaptogens
- Founded: 2026, Sofia, Bulgaria

## Product: Corti-Glow
- Type: Powdered mocktail supplement (sachets)
- Flavor: Wild Strawberry & Lime (Горска Ягода и Лайм)
- Servings: 30 sachets per box
- Key ingredients: KSM-66 Ashwagandha (600mg), Magnesium Bisglycinate (300mg), Myo-Inositol (2000mg), Bromelain (500mg), L-Theanine (200mg)
- Benefits: Lowers cortisol up to 27%, improves sleep, reduces bloating, supports hormonal balance
- Target audience: Women concerned about stress, sleep quality, skin health, and hormonal wellness
- Price range: 49.99-119.99 EUR

- Homepage: https://luralab.eu

## Scientific References
- KSM-66 Ashwagandha cortisol reduction: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/23439798/
- Magnesium and sleep quality: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/23853635/
- Myo-Inositol hormonal support: https://pubmed.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/28724175/
